channel.title: Posts on Warm journeys of bits and bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Warm journeys of bits and bytes

item.title: Hello
item.description: brew install hugo Create 2 GitHub repository Create new folder & hugo new site my_blog cd themes & git submodule add https://github.com/WingLim/hugo-tania config.toml baseURL = "https://bitsandbytes.github.io" languageCode = "en-us" title = "fascinating journey of bits and bytes" theme = "hugo-tania" hugo server hugo new post/hello.md Turn config.toml to yams git clone <the host repository.git> git checkout -b main (now it is master branch) touch readme.md $ git add/ commit/push -u origin main git submodule add -b main <the host repository.
